parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Preloads all textures, materials and proxies needed to render given object. Works with both class names and objects. Returns true once all data is loaded and ready.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> At least one object of the given classname has to be present in the current mission in order for alternative syntax version of the command to have any effect</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> distance '''preloadObject''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> distance: [[Number]] -  distance at which preload the object
</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - existing object

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] when preload is finished

</value></part><part><name>s2 </name>=<value> distance '''preloadObject''' classname

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> distance: [[Number]]  -  distance at which preload the object

</value></part><part><name>p22 </name>=<value> classname: [[String]] - classname of the object

</value></part><part><name> r2 </name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] when preload is finished
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[] [[spawn]] 
{
	[[waitUntil]] {10 [[preloadObject]] "SoldierW"};
	[[hint]] "Preload finished";
};</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[] [[spawn]] 
{
	[[waitUntil]] {10 [[preloadObject]] [[leader]] [[player]]};
	[[hint]] "Preload finished";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[preloadCamera]], [[preloadSound]], [[preloadTitleObj]], [[preloadTitleRsc]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
